## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f281d7fb655f7083b4004d10fb257b419c7aeaf1ea0b79636721d4724aec51d9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'yelp-lib' @ 17.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
